achievements.title: LeetCode Problems Solved
achievements.description: Solved 544 problems on LeetCode, including Easy, Medium, and Hard difficulties.

achievements.title: 50 Days Coding Streak
achievements.description: Maintained a 50-day coding streak on LeetCode, demonstrating consistent problem-solving dedication.

achievements.title: 100 Days Coding Streak
achievements.description: Achieved a remarkable 100-day coding streak on LeetCode, showcasing exceptional commitment to daily practice.

achievements.title: First Prize In Codathon
achievements.description: Won the first prize in Codathon, a hackathon organized by the Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, Kongu Engineering College.
